annotations.description: All in all that was an entertaining 90 minutes of football thanks to some decent attacking play. The away side was dominant and dictated the tempo of the game. The home side relied mainly on counter attacks for their chances, while the opposition constantly tried to keep their opponents under pressure.

Nicolai Muller (Hamburger) receives an accurate pass and attempts to threaten the goalkeeper with his long range strike. Unfortunately for him, his effort goes high above the crossbar.
Some great controlled play and passing in the middle of the pitch from Dortmund.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Douglas Santos (Hamburger) was quite harsh and Sascha Stegemann didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Aaron Hunt (Hamburger) takes a short corner kick.
Aaron Hunt (Hamburger) sends the ball into the box from the side of the pitch, but his cross is blocked. It will be a corner kick for Hamburger SV.

Pierre Emerick Aubameyang whips the ball in and it arrives at the feet of Andre Schurrle (Dortmund), whose wild shot goes well wide of the right post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Hamburger SV.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: What a goal! Nicolai Muller (Hamburger) receives an accurate pass and tries his luck with a long range shot. He unleashes a superb strike that goes into the bottom left corner and behind the goalkeeper.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Problems for Thomas Tuchel as Sokratis is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Felix Passlack (Dortmund) replaces him.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Sokratis (Dortmund) is writhing in pain and can now receive medical treatment after the referee signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.
Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) did his best to latch on to a crossfield pass, but it was too long and it goes out of play.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Pierre Emerick Aubameyang tees up Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) on the edge of the box and he fires the ball into the bottom left corner. 1:5.
Nicolai Muller (Hamburger) gets on the ball and beats an opponent, but his run is stopped by the referee Sascha Stegemann who sees an offensive foul.
Hamburger SV are dominating the game at the moment by exchanging a combination of one or two touch passes. Great harmony between the players.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Aaron Hunt (Hamburger) in, Dennis Diekmeier out.
Sokratis (Dortmund) leaps high deep inside the box to meet a beautiful cross from the resultant free kick. He glances a header goalwards, but it's not accurate and goes narrowly over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) swings the ball into the box from the corner kick but it's a bit too strong and it goes out of play.

Gotoku Sakai (Hamburger) meets a delivery on the edge of the penalty area and shoots towards the top of the net. He didn't put enough power into the effort, though, and Roman Burki produces an easy save.
Superb touch by Gian Luca Waldschmidt (Hamburger) as he receives a precise pass inside the box. He finds the keeper prepared as he unleashes his shot to the left side of the goal. Wonderful save!

Christian Pulisic (Dortmund) and Lukasz Piszczek have been trying to find each other with some accurate passes ever since the match started. These two definitely combine the most and are the team's most creative players.
Hamburger SV control the tempo of the game by exchanging some accurate short passes.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Today's match ends for Pierre Michel Lasogga who will be replaced by Gian Luca Waldschmidt (Hamburger).

Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) weaves through the defence with ease and gets into a good position in front of goal. He pulls the trigger in an effort to beat the keeper, but fails as the ball zooms around the right post.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal 0:4! Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) gets a shot away from the edge of the box and scores into the bottom left corner. Christian Pulisic provided an assist for the goal.

annotations.label: whistle

Up to now it has been an action packed game full of wonderful movements and opportunities. The visitors are mostly controlling the match and making it tough for the home side to keep up. The home team's main weapon is fast counter attacks. The away team is applying strong pressure and leaving the opponents little space for combination play.

annotations.label: whistle

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) weaves his way past opponents, and he unleashes a magnificent effort from the edge of the box into the bottom right corner. Rene Adler had no chance of reaching it. The score is 0:3.

Close! Christian Pulisic (Dortmund) is a whisker away from finishing off the move he started. His close range effort flies just over the bar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Hamburger SV.
Dortmund are bossing possession at the moment by exchanging some precise passes from player to player.
